title: Does anyone believe in telepathy or connecting to someone distant only with our minds? - Quora

response.answer_text: During ancient times (till Dwaparayuga) Gods, Saints and great personalities had the knowledge of Telepathy (what we call in the modern days) and they could travel anywhere in the Universe using similar technology. There are two types in it, one with body and the other, only by soul without their body. No wonder, it is waiting to be discovered by our scientists some day.
